unittitle_ssm: G.M. & A.W. Speir records on the estate of William Payne
abstract_ssm: G.M. & A.W. Speir, Counsellors at Law in New York City represented Jemima Payne, widow and executrix of William Payne, as her probate attorneys. This collection documents the 12-year process of closing William Payne's estate along with other juridicial proceedings that unfolded along the way. It contains a variety of legal documents related to the estate and some records created by William Payne during his lifetime.
corpname_ssm: G.M. & A.W. Speir, Counsellors at Law
New York (State). Surrogate's Court (New York County)
subject_ssm: Probate law and practice -- New York (State)
